Notes.Text:
This update for ImageMagick fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2025-68469: crash due to heap buffer overflow when processing a specially crafted TIFF file (bsc#1255391).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick is free and open-source software used for editing and manipulating digital images. Prior to version 7.1.1-14, ImageMagick crashes when processing a crafted TIFF file. Version 7.1.1-14 fixes the issue.
